ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.2_0: a family that was supporting the nun Thullanandā said to her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.3_0: “If we’re able, Venerables, we’ll give robe-cloth to the Sangha of nuns.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.4_0: Just then the nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence had gathered to distribute robe-cloth.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.6_0: “Please wait, Venerables. The Sangha is expecting more cloth.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.7_0: The nuns said to the nun Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.9_0: She then went to that family and said to them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.10_0: “Please give the Sangha of nuns to the Sangha of nuns.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.11_0: “We’re sorry, but we’re not able to give robe-cloth to the Sangha.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.12_0: Thullanandā told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.13_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.14_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā allow the robe season to expire because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.15_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.18_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.19_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.20_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:1.21.1_0: ‘If a nun lets the robe season expire because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.6_0: they have said, “If we’re able, then we’ll give, then we’ll act.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.8_0: if he has not participated in the robe-making procedure, he may eat in a group during the last month of the rainy season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.10_0: for one who has not participated in the robe-making procedure, if he goes beyond the last day of the rainy season, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.1.11_0: For one who has participated in the robe-making procedure, if she goes beyond the day on which the robe-making season ends, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.1_0: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she perceives it as such, and she lets the robe season expire, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.2_0: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, and she lets the robe season expire, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.3_0: If it is an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she does not perceive it as such, and she lets the robe season expire, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.4_0: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.5_0: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.2.6_0: If it is not an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, and she does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.2_0: if she obstructs them after demonstrating a benefit;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.4_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc29:2.3.5_0: The ninth training rule is finished.
